Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and good location”
Reviews.Author: Laura C
Reviews.Content: venice middle carnival amazing regarding hotel stayed night left morning spacious clean hotel ancient house beautiful doesnt elevators street market happened 11 pm didnt disturb location near train station dont walk walked alilaguna boat functions bus finally staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Location was the only plus point”
Reviews.Author: OdeToJoy-SG
Reviews.Content: hotel located near train station 10 minutes walk main attractions husband street facing noisy night morning 3 4 am stall holders setting stalls hotel reception walk stairs inconvenient heavy luggages clean windows spoilt heater satellite tv hold clothes towels toilet fan dusty hotel staff friendly requested help luggages worst hotel experience italy

HotelInfo.Name: Arcadia Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Cannaregio, 1333/d | Rio Tera San Leonardo, 30121 Venice, Italy
